about.summary: Wrapper of package VALUE to compute several indices and perform climate data validation using the tools developed in the COST action VALUE <http://www.value-cost.eu/>.
Wrapper of package VALUE to compute several indices and perform climate data validation using the tools developed in the COST action VALUE <http://www.value-cost.eu/>.

name: r-climate4r.value
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.0.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-climate4r.value
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.value/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ccf3e35564993b125f7ff61b2a66e4f582196584571f2e116188bb61234cd218

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}git
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base >=3.5,<4
    - r-value >=1.4.23
    - r-abind
    - r-transformer >=1.4.7
  run:
    - r-base >=3.5,<4
    - r-value >=1.4.23
    - r-abind
    - r-transformer >=1.4.7

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('climate4R.value')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('climate4R.value')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R
  summary: Wrapper of package VALUE to compute several indices and perform climate data validation
    using the tools developed in the COST action VALUE <http://www.value-cost.eu/>.
  doc_url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.value
  dev_url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.value
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - cofinoa
    

# Package: climate4R.value
# Depends: R (>= 3.5.0), VALUE (>= 1.4.23), transformeR (>= 1.4.7)
# Imports: abind
# Suggests: downscaleR, loadeR, loadeR.ECOMS, visualizeR
# Type: Package
# Title: A climate4R package binding the VALUE R package for model validation
# Version: 0.0.2
# Date: 2020-02-24
# Authors@R: as.person(c( "Santander Meteorology Group <http://meteo.unican.es> [cph]", "Joaquin Bedia <bediaj@unican.es> [aut]", "Maialen Iturbide <miturbide@ifca.unican.es> [aut, cre]"))
# BugReports: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.value/issues
# URL: http://www.meteo.unican.es/climate4r
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Description: Wrapper of package VALUE to compute several indices and perform climate data validation using the tools developed in the COST action VALUE <http://www.value-cost.eu/>.
# License: file LICENSE
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
